summary: VEHICLE STALLED WHILE DRIVING THROUGH THE "HILLS" RESULTING IN CONSUMER BEING STRANDED.  THE VEHICLE HAS BEEN STALLING INTERMITTENTLY FOR OVER A YEAR DUE TO BATTERY GROUND CABLE BEING LOOSELY ATTACHED TO VEHICLE'S FRAME.  AS A RESULT, CABLE WOULD COME UNATTACHED, CAUSING CAR TO STALL.  BATTERY WAS INSTALLED UNDER VEHICLE'S REAR SEAT. TS.....*AK   THE CONSUMER REQUESTED REIMBURSEMENT.   *SCC
